Fasciculus retroflexus of WHS11.EditorialNote: Note that the FR extends into the diencephalon.  Brain Info breaks it into two segments:  FR of diencephalon and FR of midbrain.
Fasciculus retroflexus of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of the fasciculus retroflexus in the Waxholm mouse brain atlas, as seen in T1 weighted images.  As seen in transverse sections:  two small dark circular structures near the midline, caudal to thalamus. Traced as far as visible in coronal plane, including parts lying within the region of the diencephalon.
